description: Modify the configuration of a user. name is the user name and it is a unique identifier.

zapikey.description: It is the group name where the user is. The user can be only in one group.

zapi_permissions.description: The possible values are: true, to enable the access to the load balancer through the ZAPI; or false, to not allow accessing through the ZAPI.

webgui_permissions.description: The possible values are: true, to enable the access to the load balancer through the WebGUI; or false, to not allow accessing through the WebGUI.

newpassword.description: New user password to access through the WebGUI.
newpassword.format_msg: must contain at least a letter and a number and a minimum length of 8 characters.
